metadata.title: CVE-2021-32917 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Prosody before 0.11.9. The proxy65 componentallows open access by default, even if neither of the users has an XMPPaccount on the local server, allowing unrestricted use of the server'sbandwidth.

criterions.comment: prosody: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
